content.rendered:
Ana Marie Serrano 

Executive Administrative Assistant

BS in Psychology: Far Eastern University, Philippines
Masters in Organizational Development and HR: University of San Francisco

 

Hi, I’m Ana Marie Serrano. As an administrative assistant at ATR, I work with the President and Vice President of Sales ensuring they get the administrative support they need to successfully serve our clients. I am also responsible for the front desk at our headquarters and love playing a part in finding jobs for people!  There is such a sense of satisfaction!

 

ADVICE: 

Advice for Candidates:  Be true to yourself and honest with the interviewer. Research the company beforehand.
